name: HDCToken

attributes.documentation: ERC-20 standard token interface, as defined here.
attributes.name: Token

attributes.documentation:
Abstract Token Smart Contract that could be used as a base contract for
ERC-20 token contracts.
attributes.name: AbstractToken

attributes.documentation: Create new Abstract Token contract.
attributes.name: AbstractToken

attributes.documentation:
Get number of tokens currently belonging to given owner.

   * @param _owner address to get number of tokens currently belonging to the
       owner of
@return number of tokens currently belonging to the owner of given address
attributes.name: balanceOf
transfer
transferFrom
approve

attributes.documentation:
Tell how many tokens given spender is currently allowed to transfer from
given owner.

   * @param _owner address to get number of tokens allowed to be transferred
       from the owner of
@param _spender address to get number of tokens allowed to be transferred
       by the owner of
@return number of tokens given spender is currently allowed to transfer
        from given owner
attributes.name: allowance

attributes.documentation: HardyCorps smart contract.
attributes.name: HDCToken

attributes.documentation:
Create new token smart contract and make msg.sender the
owner of this smart contract.
attributes.name: HDCToken

attributes.documentation:
Get total number of tokens in circulation.

   * @return total number of tokens in circulation
attributes.name: totalSupply
transfer
transferFrom
approve

attributes.documentation:
Create _value new tokens and give new created tokens to msg.sender.
May only be called by smart contract owner.

   * @param _value number of tokens to create
@return true if tokens were created successfully, false otherwise
attributes.name: createTokens

attributes.documentation:
Set new owner for the smart contract.
May only be called by smart contract owner.

   * @param _newOwner address of new owner of the smart contract
attributes.name: setOwner

attributes.documentation:
Freeze ALL token transfers.
May only be called by smart contract owner.
attributes.name: freezeTransfers

attributes.documentation:
Unfreeze ALL token transfers.
May only be called by smart contract owner.
attributes.name: unfreezeTransfers

attributes.documentation:
Freeze specific account
May only be called by smart contract owner.
attributes.name: freezeAccount

attributes.documentation: Logged when token transfers were frozen.
attributes.name: Freeze

attributes.documentation: Logged when token transfers were unfrozen.
attributes.name: Unfreeze

attributes.documentation: Logged when a particular account is frozen.
attributes.name: FrozenFunds

attributes.documentation: when accidentally send other tokens are refunded
attributes.name: RefundTokens
